# Django
http://www.djangoproject.com/download/1.2.1/tarball/

# Imaging library needed for easy_thumbnails
http://effbot.org/downloads/Imaging-1.1.7.tar.gz

# Thumbails used for mugshots
-e git+http://github.com/SmileyChris/easy-thumbnails.git#egg=easy_thumbnails

# Django-guardian used for privacy settings
-e git+http://github.com/lukaszb/django-guardian.git#egg=guardian

# Django-south for migrations
